name: Flight Club (Adam L.)
description:
Take to the skies in FLIGHT CLUB where victory is just a hop and drop away!

Challenge a friend in a 1v1 match, propelling yourself higher and higher in order to unleash devastating attacks -- drop bombs, raise hell, and eliminate your opponent! BOMBS AWAY!

Developed by: Adam Liang, Audrey Vidamo, Joel Forrester, Richard Gillis
